name: We must play the fox
description:
:

Foxy likes eggs but they are guarded by the chickens. Help Foxy get as many eggs as he can before the chickens notice!

The game uses procedural generation for the map, so every game played will be different.


We decided to use PICO8 fantasy console since it seems to be the perfect match for the low resolution requirement.


Controls:

Start the game pressing button1 or 2 (z or x key). Move foxy with the arrows.


Credits:

- misato, mapedorr - developers

- robrechtJ - developer and game art

- milesgordon - music and fx

Results: Criteria Rank Score Aesthetic (sound and visual) #25 4.267 Overall Enjoyment #26 3.800 Overall #29 4.133 64x64 Authenticity #39 4.800 Game Feel #56 3.667
